channel.title: Help with compiler - please!

item.title: Help with compiler - please!
item.dc:creator: @_Bro [Bro]
item.description:
@_Bro wrote:

Hey guys what do I do if im running 64bit and need to compile i just figured out how to make the client and run 64 bit but the compiler is alot different please help? Usually i just paste this in there but idk where to for this.“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”

This is compiler.

@echo off
@TITLE Digital Dogs
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
